description: Migration and backfill plan for canonical_key / row_hash versioning with incremental processing and compatibility strategy
steps: Analyze current key generation patterns in ageClient.ts
Document multiple migration strategies with trade-offs
Define canonical key version tagging strategy (v1, v2, etc.)
Create backfill pseudocode with batch processing and resume capability
Document validation and smoke test procedures
Define staged rollout phases and timelines
Document rollback procedures for each migration phase
Create feature card and update Implementation Roadmap
